channel.title: Definitely loving the improvements after playing today!
channel.description:
**Every class has their own theme music!** I didn't notice until today... *(duh it’s the patch) Also I was wondering if the new _titles_ and _avatars_ are unlocked for all? ...where you only need gold to buy them or is there some kind of requisite to unlocking them?
Anyways, back to killin' you fools with the curse :fool:

item.title: Definitely loving the improvements after playing today!
item.dc:creator: slappy
item.description:
Okay I see. They might just be seasonal items

Read full topic
item.source: Definitely loving the improvements after playing today!
